item.title: How setup Haproxy with zero downtime reload from code source
item.description: if you are looking for a modern load balancer with zero downtime when you need to reload its configuration, HAProxy 1.8 and Linux kernel >=3.9 could take advantage of a new reload mechanism which can transfer sockets from the old process to the new process without dropping any connections.
